name: Hollywood
description: Licensed Hollywood electricians serving Broward County, Florida. Solomon Electric provides professional residential and commercial electrical services, from beachfront properties to historic homes near Young Circle.

challenges.title: Coastal Electrical Durability
challenges.description: Hollywood's beachfront properties face constant salt air. We use corrosion-proof materials and specialized techniques to ensure long-lasting outdoor electrical performance.

challenges.title: Historic Home Restoration
challenges.description: Central Hollywood and Hollywood Lakes feature many beautiful historic properties with aging electrical systems. We specialize in modernizing these homes while preserving their character.

challenges.title: Commercial Entertainment Needs
challenges.description: With the nearby Hard Rock and the vibrant Broadwalk, Hollywood businesses require specialized lighting, audio-visual wiring, and high-capacity power systems.

faqs.question: What electrical services do you offer in Hollywood?
faqs.answer: We provide comprehensive electrical services throughout Hollywood including panel upgrades (100A to 200A), emergency repairs, outlet and switch installation, lighting upgrades, ceiling fan installation, GFCI protection, EV charger installation, generator hookups, and 24/7 emergency service. Our licensed electricians serve all Hollywood neighborhoods.

faqs.question: Are your electricians licensed to work in Hollywood?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. All Solomon Electric technicians are Florida State Licensed (License #EC13012419) and fully insured. We pull all required Broward County permits for electrical work in Hollywood, ensuring your project passes inspection and meets current NEC code requirements.

faqs.question: How do I know if my Hollywood home needs a panel upgrade?
faqs.answer: Many Hollywood homes have outdated 100-amp panels that can't handle modern electrical demands. Signs you need an upgrade include: frequently tripping breakers, dimming lights when appliances run, planning to add an EV charger or pool, or if you have a Federal Pacific, Zinsco, or fuse box. We offer free panel inspections throughout Hollywood.

faqs.question: Do you offer 24/7 emergency electrical service in Hollywood?
faqs.answer: Yes! We provide round-the-clock emergency electrical service to all Hollywood neighborhoods. If you're experiencing sparking outlets, burning smells, power outages, or any electrical emergency, call us immediately—we respond quickly to protect your property and family.

faqs.question: Do you provide emergency service in Hollywood Hills and Emerald Hills?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer full 24/7 emergency electrical service to all Hollywood neighborhoods. If you have a tripping breaker, partial power loss, or any electrical concern, we're ready to help.

faqs.question: Are your Hollywood electricians familiar with city permits?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We frequently work with the Hollywood Building Department and ensure all our projects are fully permitted and meet both local and NEC code requirements.

seoContent.heading: Your Trusted Hollywood, FL Electrical Partners
seoContent.body: Hollywood, the 'Diamond of the Gold Coast,' is a beautiful city that bridges the gap between Fort Lauderdale and Miami. From the family-friendly hills to the world-famous Broadwalk, Hollywood is a community of diverse needs. Solomon Electric has been a staple in Hollywood for over 15 years, providing safe and reliable power to our neighbors.

seoContent.heading: Understanding Hollywood's Electrical Needs
seoContent.body: Hollywood homes and businesses have unique electrical requirements that demand local expertise. Our electricians understand Broward County building codes, climate considerations, and the specific challenges of South Florida electrical systems. From aging infrastructure in established neighborhoods to modern smart home installations, we provide solutions tailored to Hollywood's needs.

seoContent.heading: Comprehensive Electrical Services for Your Hollywood Home
seoContent.body: Whether you're upgrading an older home's electrical system, installing modern energy-efficient lighting, adding an EV charger, or facing an urgent electrical issue, our licensed team delivers professional solutions throughout Hollywood. We provide transparent upfront pricing, respect your property, and stand behind our work with guarantees that have earned South Florida's trust for over 15 years.

seoContent.heading: Serving Every Hollywood Neighborhood with Excellence
seoContent.body: Whether you're starting a renovation in Emerald Hills, upgrading the electrical at a beachfront rental, or need the peace of mind of a whole-home surge protector in Oakwood, Solomon Electric is your first choice. Our licensed electricians understand the specific challenges of Hollywood's coastal and historic properties, ensuring your home is safe and compliant.
